info.name: YouTube player enhancements v1.2.4 (broken)
info.description:
Update (2017): YouTube broke this and I can't fix it
The new minimalistic design of YouTube unfortunately broke the main feature of this style, and it seems there is no way to implement the full-featured mouseover menu (with quality and speed selection) again purely with css.
So I won't be updating this style anymore ...sorry =(
upgrades the Youtube html5 player with some awesome features like
showing options on hovering the bottom bar, // broken by youtube design update
directly selectable speed and quality (no more dropdowns!), // broken by youtube design update
a new minimalist fullscreen player // that's like the new youtube design and some other little tweaks and changes (appearance, animations, static ads (re)moved)
info.additionalInfo:
Update (2016): Broken due to youtube updates. I'll try to get around to fixing/rewriting this within the next weeks Edit (2017): Nope sorry, can't fix it. No more updates I'm afraid :( If you see a possibility on how to re-implement the speed and quality drop-downs in a mouse-over menu with css or found a good chrome-extension for changing those settings without having to click 3 times, send me an e-mail: j48h108-css@yahoo.de
  • created in July 2015
  • currently in version v1.2.4
  • any chapter can be easily disabled and enabled
Chapter overview ------------------ Chapter header added in version ´´´´´´´´´´´´´´ ```````````````` minimalist fullscreen player 1.2.3 fixing fullscreen ad 1.2.4 brighter buttons 1.2.3 standard changes 1.1.0 animations and advanced fun stuff 1.2.2 awesome menu 1.0.0 moving skip ad button 1.2.1 move static ads out of view 1.2.0 Any feature suggestions, bug reports, requests and other feedback is highly appreciated. Just send me an e-mail to j48h108-css@yahoo.de. Thanks x) I'll implement userstyles' download settings later when I have time.
